Row.Text: I am Fëanor, first son of Finwë and the High King of the Ñoldor, who are you?
I am Maedhros, first son of Fëanor and Lord of Himring , who are you?
We are Celegorm and Curufin, sons of Fëanor and Lords of Himlad, who are you?
I am Maglor, second son of Fëanor and Lord of Maglor's Gap, who are you?
I am Caranthir, son of Fëanor and Lord of Thargelion, who are you?
We are Amrod and Amras, twin sons of Fëanor and Lords of Estolad, who are you?
I am Fingolfin, son of Finwë and the King of Hithlum, who are you?
I am Fingon, first son of Fingolfin, who are you?
I am Turgon, son of Fingolfin and King of Gondolin, who are you?
I am Finrod Felagund, first son of Finarfin and King of Nargothrond, who are you?
I am Orodreth, son of Angrod and Lord of Minas Tirith, who are you?
We are Angrod and Aegnor, sons of Finarfin and Lords of Dorthonion , who are you?
I am Elu Thingol King of Doriath, High King of the Sindar and the Lord of Beleriand, who are you?
I am Elu Thingol King of Doriath and High King of the Sindar, who are you?
I am Denethor King of the Laiquendi, who are you?
I am Húrin Thalion the Lord of Dor-lómin, who are you?
I am Azaghâl King of the Broadbeam Dwarves of Belegost, who are you?
I am Naugladur the Lord of Nogrod, who are you?
I am Finarfin High King of the Ñoldor in Valinor, who are you?
I am Ingwë King of the Vanyar and High King of the Elves, who are you?
I am Olwë King of the Falmari, Lord of Tol Eressëa and Alqualondë, who are you?
